urgent.action: Fix HTTP to HTTPS redirect - http page is getting 115 impressions separately. Add 301 redirect from http:// to https:// in Vercel config
urgent.reasoning: Duplicate indexing splits ranking signals and causes canonicalization issues. Google is tracking http and https as separate pages, diluting your SEO power by ~7%

urgent.action: Rewrite meta title to include 'Best Donuts in Waikiki' and add compelling meta description with opening date, 100% Kona coffee, unique flavors
urgent.reasoning: 143 impressions but only 0.7% CTR at position 8.2 means people see you but don't click. With proper meta tags, even 5% CTR would mean 7+ additional clicks/week

quickWins.action: Add 'Waikiki Coffee' to H1 or create dedicated landing page. Include in meta title: 'Kona Coffee Donut | Authentic Waikiki Coffee Shop'
quickWins.reasoning: Position 5.8 with 97 impressions - moving to top 3 could double CTR. High-volume local keyword with strong intent

quickWins.action: Add schema markup for LocalBusiness and FoodEstablishment. Include priceRange, openingHours (Feb 25, 2026), and aggregate rating when available
quickWins.reasoning: Rich snippets increase CTR by 20-30% on average. At 143 impressions, even small CTR improvement yields measurable clicks

quickWins.action: Ensure Google Business Profile is claimed, verified, and has accurate NAP (Name, Address, Phone). Add photos and business hours
quickWins.reasoning: Position 2 for 'donut shop near me' with 0 clicks suggests GBP issues. Near-me queries heavily favor local pack results

opportunities.action: Create blog post: 'What is Kona Coffee? A Guide to Hawaii's Famous Bean' targeting informational queries like 'coffee kona'
opportunities.reasoning: You rank #3 for 'coffee kona' with minimal content. Educational content builds authority and captures tourists researching before visiting Hawaii

opportunities.action: Add Japanese language page or section targeting Japanese tourists (2% of traffic from Japan). Include ハワイ コナコーヒー and ワイキキ ドーナツ
opportunities.reasoning: Japan represents 2% of traffic - significant for a local business. Japanese tourists are major Waikiki demographic and actively search in Japanese

opportunities.action: Audit mobile page speed and UX. Run Lighthouse test. Ensure click-to-call button and mobile-friendly menu
opportunities.reasoning: Mobile CTR (18.8%) lags desktop (25%) by 6+ points. For a local coffee shop, most searches are mobile - this gap costs clicks

opportunities.action: Create pages for: 'Best Coffee in Waikiki', 'Waikiki Breakfast Spots', 'Hawaiian Donuts' to capture long-tail traffic
opportunities.reasoning: Only 12 pages indexed limits ranking potential. Topical authority requires content depth around coffee, donuts, and Waikiki dining

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' has 41.2% CTR at position 1.1 - excellent brand recognition
insights.suggestion: Maintain brand presence and consider branded content campaigns

insights.observation: High impressions on 'waikiki coffee' (97) and 'waikiki donuts' (143) but low CTR indicates strong competition
insights.suggestion: Differentiate with compelling meta descriptions highlighting unique value props: 100% Kona coffee, fresh daily, Hawaiian flavors

insights.observation: 4 days until grand opening (Feb 25, 2026) - traffic building organically
insights.suggestion: Capitalize on launch buzz with social media, local press outreach, and 'Now Open' schema update on opening day

insights.observation: Japan (2%) and Germany showing organic interest without targeted content
insights.suggestion: Post-opening priority: Japanese language content for tourist market
